MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the KY8 postcode area of Leven. This is causing an intermittent supply to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:40am. Our engineers have arrived in the local area to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:06am on Monday, 29 March 2021
